title: Sara Ke Puccho

synonyms: UHA Mikakutou x Inoue Ryou Collab Kikaku

synopsis: UHA Mikakutou is a candy company that makes a chewy confectionery called Puccho. The candy has mascots and the company collaborated with Ryou Inoue for an anime short with these mascots in a Revolutionary Girl Utena inspired feature. Special LINE stamps were also available in honor of the collaboration.
